title: Model Metadata in Solution Settings

detailed_design.description: Add a dedicated Models tab in Settings for browsing model metadata (tags, pros, cons, benefits). Enables users to make informed model choices when configuring routing and chat.
detailed_design.solution: 1. Add Models tab to Settings panel. 2. Implement search and tag filter. 3. Show model cards with tags and benefits; HoverCard for full pros/cons. 4. Backend model_metadata.json + merge_metadata_into_model. 5. ModelInfoCard component for consistent display.

acceptance_criteria: Models tab shows all models with tags, benefits
Search by model name or tag
Filter by tag (coding, fast, privacy, etc.)
Hover over model card shows full pros/cons
Metadata flows from API to all model selectors

user_stories.story: As a user, I want to browse model metadata in Settings so I can choose the right model for each task.
As a user, I want to filter models by tag (e.g. coding, privacy) so I can quickly find suitable options.
